title: U.S. Capitol barricades return as truckers head to Washington

content: WASHINGTON, Feb 27 (Reuters) - Federal authorities are reinstalling fencing around the U.S. Capitol as Washington prepares for planned trucker protests inspired by demonstrations in Canada against CO… [+1651 chars]
